text: I believe that children are our future. Teach them well and let them lead the way. Show them all the beauty they possess inside.
author: Whitney Houston

text: The lover knows much more about absolute good and universal beauty than any logician or theologian, unless the latter, too, be lovers in disguise.
author: George Santayana

text: It is well known that Beauty does not look with a good grace on the timid advances of Humour.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

text: There is certainly no absolute standard of beauty. That precisely is what makes its pursuit so interesting.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

text: There is great beauty in going through life without anxiety or fear. Half our fears are baseless, and the other half discreditable.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee
